title: War fallout and aid demands are overshadowing the climate talks in Egypt
description: War in Ukraine, rising energy and food prices, and growing enmity between the West on the one hand and Russia and China on the other make finding cooperation at the coming climate talks difficult.
content:encoded:
War in Ukraine, rising energy and food prices, and growing enmity between the West on the one hand and Russia and China on the other make finding cooperation at the coming climate talks difficult.

(Image credit: Michael Probst/AP)
dc:creator: The Associated Press
